entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:57 PM EST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, 0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Windsor Airport 9:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 March 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: 0.1°C
Pressure: 103.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 61 %
Dewpoint: -6.6°C
Wind: N 21 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 March 2023
